channel.title: CVE Feed for WooCommerce -- Product Vendors
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WooCommerce -- Product Vendors

item.title: CVE-2017-20193|2024-10-16T12:58:55.215Z -- woocommerce -- product%20vendors
item.description: The Product Vendors is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the 'vendor_description' parameter in versions up to, and including, 2.0.35 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2017-20193|2024-10-16T07:31:51.171Z -- woocommerce -- product%20vendors
item.description: The Product Vendors is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the 'vendor_description' parameter in versions up to, and including, 2.0.35 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
